name: Amazo
description:
Embark on this incredible adventure through the forests of Latin America, where the Warrior Amazo must find a very rare plant, which is located in the most mountainous areas of the Amazon, because this is the only cure capable of helping his wife. He is not alone, his little daughter, possesses powers and will help him with his little monkey. In this way, Amazo must search for this mysterious plant while teaching his daughter how to protect herself in this hostile and unpredictable place.

LOCAL
Explore the mysteries in Brazilian forests, where there are several unknown symbols and monuments. The sites have natural hazards such as well-carved rocks, deep cracks in the earth, large trees and precipices. You can also find giant stone statues that guard entrances to the sites in the setting and ruins of an ancient civilization, and more.

Enemies:
The forest is full of beasts that will not hesitate to attack anyone that encounter in its path. Some are faster and like to be in high places such as trees and cliff, others, like to be in lower places in the bushes. However, there are other types of enemies that are out of their way to attack you in a hurry. To defeat them, you must use brute force as the girl's magical abilities.

Collectibles :
Collect the yellow fruits to make points that will be needed to pick up the keys to open the gates guarded by the mentioned stone giants.
Collect the green fruits and eggs in the nest to regain your life.
Collect the purple fruits to regain the girl's energy.
The magic mask makes the player immune to attacks and fall damage, but their magic has limited time, so quickly use to fall from places too high.

Movements:
The player can walk, run, run fast, double jump, punch and kick. The player has the ability to control the air, due to this, you can move when not touching the feet on the ground. this ability is required to jump long distance. You just need to run fast and jump at the same time.


FEATURES:
AMAZO features good 3D graphics that offers an immersive experience.

3D graphics.
Interesting fights.
Special attack of the little girl.
Jumping system that requires skill.
Jump over crocodiles.
Solve puzzle.

Don't miss this chance to help Amzo and his daughter on this exciting adventure!
